column5: Holy smokes!! Look at the size of that little Pigeonfisher!! The old man must be feeding him beer and wings!!

Pidge.... I love Gerritt too!! I mean whats not to love!! I know that you think from time to time.... just how did I get so good looking? it is ok... I understand lol  Wow look at the size of that Kidlet!!! Handsome too I might add... Has to have the look of his mother, I definatly aint from you!  PM me your Phone number freak...  Gerritt.
Every Avatar I try seems to be cut off  ?  I have resized them, I see Terry, Tom and Wayne's seem to be working.  Am I just dumb
in controls you can link it where it states "Enter a URL to an online avatar image" to wherever it is hosted at this time and it should work
I've tried the link thing a few times and it seems to capture it but the display seems to be cutting it off. I think Rick's is doing the same thing.
THis is another Internet Exporer issue. I just fixed the clicking one..working on this one.
Thanks Rick
glad I use firefox....lol

I'm having the same problem as Jim with my avatar.  It says they will be automatically resized, but it wouldn't work, so I resized it myself to 121x 90.  My avatar seemed to get posted, but it's only 121 X 1 pixels now, same as Jims.
Same here.  Joey
Just checking mine.   Dang, that 56" fish looks smaller.....
My avatar works fine and I am using MIExplorer
Avatar issue resolved!
Ok I will try mine again.  great it worked.  nice cooler Joey
There's a cooler in the picture Pete..hell there is.. I couldn't get past the legs I guess...
Does my avatar work?  YUP
OK, all the avatars seem to be working fine now except Joey's, the poor girl's boat looks just like an ice chest
n ice chest indeed.
test
Guess who is my new screen backround.....and you can bet your ass it aint Roy. Sorry bud I cant wake up in the mornin with your mug on my puter.
Yawn
hey I have picture of me like that too I will see if I can find it and and use it as my avatar..rub a dub dub

Well, it sure will get busy in here soon enough.  I still haven't worked on my avitar nor my signature. I will say one thing, it sure does have a nice look around here. I have tried a few buttons and such. So far I haven't found anything that would be a problem. Hats off to ya Rick.

and here I thought she was showing off her box what the hell do I know?  its to late for me time for bed
Even Gerritt is allowed in?  can I say I love Gerritt?  Even Gerritt is allowed in?
